name: Ballet & Creative Movement
description: This enrichment program is more than a dance class; it's fun and relevant to the developmental stages. The class is based on the Royal Academy of Dance (RAD) international program, providing high-quality training standards. The curriculum helps dancers develop a solid dance foundation through various components, including ballet, contemporary, improvisation, exploration, and character dance, to facilitate students' diverse learning needs, cultures, and backgrounds.
